From: stack <stack@...>
Subject: [Announcement] 1.4.0 release candidate
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=168599281
X-Yahoo-Profile: stackarchiveorg

CVS HEAD currently holds the 1.4.0 release candidate. It would be much 
appreciated if the good people of this list could take some time to 
download the candidate and take it on a 'burn'.  If there are issues, 
please report them back here to the list.  

The release notes are not yet complete for the 1.4.0 release but the 
main new features and limitations have been synopsized: See 
http://crawler.archive.org/articles/releasenotes.html#1_4_0.

To obtain the candidate, checkout HEAD or go download one of the 
packaged distributions from our build server: 
http://crawltools.archive.org:8080/cruisecontrol/artifacts/HEAD-heritrix/20050419181649 
(The release candidate is '04/19/2005 18:16:49 (build.433)' up on our 
build server). 

There'll be no more src commits against HEAD until 1.4.0 is released 
unless we turn up a showstopper.  If all goes well, we hope to release 
1.4.0 before the end of the month.

Yours,
The Heritrix Crew

P.S. The Heritrix version continues to show as 1.3.0 and will continue 
so until we actually do the 1.4.0 release.
P.P.S We labeled the repository 'heritrix-1_4_0RC1'.
